explanation.overview: 这些形容词都描述'友善'或'支持'的态度，但在情感深度和行为表现上有所不同。

details.meaning: 能够理解并体谅他人困境，给予情感支持
details.example: The teacher was sympathetic when I explained my family problems.（当我解释家庭问题时，老师表现得很理解。）

details.meaning: 本性善良，待人友好，乐于助人
details.example: It was very kind of you to help me move.（你帮我搬家真是太好了。）

details.meaning: 提供实际支持或帮助，强调行动而非情感
details.example: She plays a supporting role in the project.（她在这个项目中扮演支持角色。）

details.meaning: 随和的，容易相处的，愿意配合的
details.example: He's always so agreeable to everyone's suggestions.（他总是乐于接受大家的建议。）

details.meaning: 富有同情心的，对他人痛苦感同身受并愿意帮助
details.example: The compassionate nurse comforted the grieving family.（富有同情心的护士安慰了悲伤的家属。）

life_examples.sympathetic: My boss was sympathetic about my childcare issues.（老板对我的育儿问题表示理解。）
life_examples.kind: A kind coworker brought me coffee when I was stressed.（一位好心的同事在我压力大时给我带了咖啡。）
life_examples.supporting: The IT department provided supporting documents for the presentation.（IT部门为演示提供了支持文件。）
life_examples.agreeable: She's always agreeable to schedule changes.（她总是乐于接受日程变更。）
life_examples.compassionate: The compassionate HR manager helped me through a difficult time.（富有同情心的人力资源经理帮我度过了困难时期。）

life_examples.sympathetic: My friend was sympathetic when my pet died.（我的朋友在我的宠物去世时很理解我。）
life_examples.kind: A kind stranger returned my lost wallet.（一位好心的陌生人归还了我丢失的钱包。）
life_examples.agreeable: He's very agreeable to try new restaurants.（他很乐意尝试新餐厅。）
life_examples.compassionate: The compassionate doctor spent extra time with elderly patients.（富有同情心的医生为老年患者多花时间。）

common_errors.error: ❌ The agreeable nurse comforted the crying child.
common_errors.correction: ✅ The compassionate/sympathetic nurse comforted the crying child.（安慰哭泣的孩子用compassionate/sympathetic）

common_errors.error: ❌ She showed kind understanding of my situation.
common_errors.correction: ✅ She showed sympathetic/compassionate understanding of my situation.（对处境的理解用sympathetic/compassionate）

mini_test.question: 选择最合适的词：The ___ neighbor always shovels snow from my driveway.
哪个词最适合描述'对他人痛苦感同身受'？
填空：She's very ___ to work with because she never complains.
